title:
On the finite generation of the cohomology of abelian extensions of Hopf
  algebras
abstract:
A finite-dimensional Hopf algebra is called quasi-split if it is Morita
equivalent to a split abelian extension of Hopf algebras. Combining results of
Schauenburg and Negron, it is shown that every quasi-split finite-dimensional
Hopf algebra satisfies the finite generation cohomology conjecture of Etingof
and Ostrik. This is applied to a family of pointed Hopf algebras in odd
characteristic introduced by Angiono, Heckenberger and the first author,
proving that they satisfy the aforementioned conjecture.
